text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Idha Đarabtum Fi Sabili Allahi Fatabayyanu Wa La Taqulu Liman 'Alqa 'Ilaykumu As-Salama Lasta Mu'uminaan Tabtaghuna `Arađa Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Fa`inda Allahi Maghanimu Kathiratun Kadhalika Kuntum Min Qablu Famanna Allahu `Alaykum Fatabayyanu 'Inna Allaha Kana Bima Ta`maluna Khabiraan
